dcterms:description: The MIMIC-III dataset is the largest publicly available clinical dataset for text, comprising hospital records associated with over 40,000 patients, focusing on discharge summaries that are human expert-labeled with a set of ICD-9 codes.
dcterms:title: MIMIC-III
